article_title: How Big Will Obamacare Penalty Taxes Be?

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: The deadline is looming: If you don’t have approved insurance coverage by March 31 (and are not exempt from the requirement), the Affordable Care Act will hit you with a penalty on your 2014 income tax return. It is often said the tax is $95, but for many people it [...]
